item.description:
The Portuguese association, IHM (Immaculate Heart of Mary) Mass Emmaus/Peace is hosting a Masquarade Ball fundraiser for the Franciscan Hospital for Children in Boston/Brighton, MA at their Holy Ghost Hall.

**Black Tie Attire and Decorative Mask Recommended**

There will be food and live Portuguese music. This hall is located in Peabody, a strong center of Portuguese descendants especialy the Azores, in particular the island of Graciosa.

Their fundraisers are famous for having lots of good Portuguese food.

Here is the menu.

Appetizers:

  • Cheese & Crackers & Fruit


Meal (including dessert)

  • caldo verde
  • garden salad

  • vegetable rice
  • roasted potatoes

  • carne assada (alcatra)
  • fried fish fillet

  • pineapple mousse


There will also be a cash bar available for alcholic beverages.

Portuguese Band Information

Here is the link for music by David DeMelo Banda International
the URL is http://www.myspace.co..., this is his myspace account.
You can also view him on http://www.lusobeat.c....

IHS Mass Emmaus/Peace Information

The Holy Ghost Hall website is http://www.myspace.co..., this is also myspace.
There address 20 Howley St - Peabody, MA 01960

The event will be Sat. February 6, 2010, from 6PM - 12AM

COST

Tickets are $50 per person.
It would be appreciated if the money could be sent in advance.
To purchase tickets, contact Paula Jorge at 617-838-0837 or email PaulaJoe1992@yahoo.com to confirm your payment, and she will then send your tickets accordingly.

The checks can be made to the attention of IHM Mass Emmaus/Peace and mailed to Paula Jorge at 76 Gordon Street, Leominster, MA 01453.

For more questions, contact Paula at 617-838-0837 or email PaulaJoe1992@yahoo.com

Please RSVP by January 20, 2010.
